Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 645 Filed 03/11/22 Page 2 of 50 2 M38TMAX1
1 (Case called)
2 DEPUTY CLERK: Counsel, please state your name for the record, starting with the government.
3 MS. MOE: Good morning, your Honor, Alison Moe, Lara Pomerantz, Andrew Rohrbach and Maurene Comey for the government.
4 THE COURT: Good morning, counsel.
5 MS. STERNHEIM: Bobbi C. Sternheim and Christian Everdell for Ghislaine Maxwell, who is present at defense table.
6 THE COURT: Good morning.
7 And Mr. Spodek on behalf of Juror 50, please state your appearance.
8 MR. SPODEK: Good morning, your Honor, Todd Spodek on behalf of Juror 50, who is present.
9 THE COURT: Thank you. We're here today for a hearing on the defendant's motion for a new trial. The government has consented and to indeed requested this hearing as to Juror 50.
10 My opinion and order dated February 24, 2022 ordered this hearing into Juror 50's responses to questions on the jury selection questionnaire. That opinion lays out the scope and nature of today's hearing.
11 In addition to the motion for new trial briefing that I received from of the parties, I also received proposed questions from both sides which I have carefully considered in SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 645 Filed 03/11/22 Page 2 of 50 2 M38TMAX1

(Case called)
DEPUTY CLERK: Counsel, please state your name for the record, starting with the government.
MS. MOE: Good morning, your Honor, Alison Moe, Lara Pomerantz, Andrew Rohrbach and Maurene Comey for the government.
THE COURT: Good morning, counsel.
MS. STERNHEIM: Bobbi C. Sternheim and Christian Everdell for Ghislaine Maxwell, who is present at defense table.
THE COURT: Good morning.
And Mr. Spodek on behalf of Juror 50, please state your appearance.
MR. SPODEK: Good morning, your Honor, Todd Spodek on behalf of Juror 50, who is present.
THE COURT: Thank you. We're here today for a hearing on the defendant's motion for a new trial. The government has consented and to indeed requested this hearing as to Juror 50.
My opinion and order dated February 24, 2022 ordered this hearing into Juror 50's responses to questions on the jury selection questionnaire. That opinion lays out the scope and nature of today's hearing.
In addition to the motion for new trial briefing that I received from of the parties, I also received proposed questions from both sides which I have carefully considered in

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with clear and legible text. There are no visible redactions or damage.
